title: Harvesting the Potatoes + Plans for Fall Veges

tasks.task: Potato Harvest and Compost Application Task
subtasks: Talk about the timing of the potato harvest relative to local climate conditions
Identify the potato variety (German butterball) and discuss its expected taste
Demonstrate the use of a bedding fork for potato harvesting
Describe the process of clearing the harvested area for future planting
Explain the benefits of using compost and no-dig techniques
Discuss the choice of row cover and its importance during heatwaves
Mention the potential for direct-seeding brassicas after potato harvest
Mention the preparation of apple tree beds with mulch and organic materials
Note the plan for seeding brassicas into prepared beds
Mention the planting technique for garlic and onions for the next season
Discuss the challenges of growing potatoes in heavy clay soils
Mention the potential for volunteer potato plants growing from leftover tubers
Provide advice on cooking and preparing German butterball potatoes
